alert.note: Alert for Southern Dona Ana County, Mesilla Valley; Southwest Desert, Mimbres Basin (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS El Paso (Southern New Mexico and extreme Western Texas)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 26 at 9:56PM MDT by NWS El Paso
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Luna, southwestern Dona Ana and northwestern El Paso Counties through 1045 PM MDT... At 951 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 20 miles southwest of Santa Teresa, moving northeast at 20 mph. This storm has large hail with it, and there is a small possibility that the storm and hail persists into southern Dona Ana County. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... West El Paso, Columbus, Santa Teresa, Anthony, Sunland Park, Canutillo, Anthony Gap, Westway, Vinton, La Union, Union Pacific Intermodal Terminal, Mount Riley, Camel Mountain and Kilbourne Hole. This includes the following highways... Interstate 10 in New Mexico between mile markers 163 and 164. Interstate 10 in Texas between mile markers 1 and 14, and near mile marker 17. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Southern Dona Ana County, Mesilla Valley; Southwest Desert, Mimbres Basin
